languages.text: "И этот путь, это мгновение я желаю пройти вместе с тобой. Не как человек и дитя Азуриана — на равных".
"And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."
languages.original_text: "И этот путь, это мгновение я желаю пройти вместе с тобой. Не как человек и дитя Азуриана — на равных".

traits.locale_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to live alongside you. For as long as the stars will let me. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan — as equals."
"And this road, this moment, I wish to live alongside you. For as long as the stars will let me. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan — as equals."
"And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. For as long as the stars will let me. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."
"And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. For as long as the stars will let me. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."
"And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

languages.text: “在这条道路上，我希望能与你共度此时此刻。我们之间不再是人类与阿苏焉的子嗣，而是完全平等的存在。”
languages.original_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

traits.locale_text: “在这条路上，只要群星允许，我希望能与你共度此时此刻。我们之间不再是人类与阿苏焉的子嗣，而是完全平等的存在。”

languages.text: 「この道で、この時を、お前と過ごしたいと思っている。人としてでなく、またアシュリアンの御子としてでもなく、ただ、同等の存在として」
languages.original_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

traits.locale_text: 「この道で、この時を、お前と過ごしたいと思っている。人としてでなく、またアシュリアンの御子としてでもなく、ただ、同等の存在として」

languages.text: « Et cette route, cet instant, je souhaite les partager avec vous, non pas comme {mf|un humain|une humaine} et une enfant d'Asuryan, mais comme des {mf|égaux|égales}. »
languages.original_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

traits.locale_text: « Et cette route, cet instant, je souhaite les partager avec vous, aussi longtemps que les étoiles me le permettront. Non pas comme {mf|un humain|une humaine} et une enfant d'Asuryan, mais comme des {mf|égaux|égales}. »

languages.text: «Y este camino, este momento, deseo compartirlo contigo. Y no como {mf|un humano|una humana} y una hija de Asuryan, sino como iguales».
languages.original_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

traits.locale_text: «Y este camino, este momento, deseo compartirlo contigo. Y no como {mf|un humano|una humana} y una hija de Asuryan, sino como iguales».

languages.text: "Und diese Straße, diesen Augenblick, möchte ich mit Euch verbringen. Nicht wie ein Mensch und ein Kind von Asuryan, sondern als Gleichberechtigte."
languages.original_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

traits.locale_text: Und diese Straße, diesen Augenblick, möchte ich mit Euch verbringen. Solange die Sterne es mir ermöglichen. Nicht wie ein Mensch und ein Kind von Asuryan, sondern als Gleichberechtigte."

languages.text: "Bu yolu, bu anı seninle geçirmek istiyorum. Birer insan ve Asuryan'ın Çocuğu olarak değil, akran olarak."
languages.original_text: "And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yolu, bu anı seninle geçirmek istiyorum. Birer insan ve Asuryan'ın Çocuğu olarak değil, akran olarak."
